name: Smart India Hackathon Finalist
desc: Top 5 against 500 teams all over India
keyFeature: Real-time medicine availability tracking
Geo-based pharmacy lookup and routing
Secure API for inventory sync across suppliers
Role-based dashboards for pharmacists and distributors

name: Union Bank Finalist
desc: Top 5 against 1200 teams all over India
keyFeature: Unified customer dashboard for banking and insurance
Instant UPI-based microloan approval system
Real-time fraud detection using transaction pattern analysis
Secure Aadhaar and PAN-based user verification
Role-based portals for users, bank officials, and auditors
Automated KYC with document OCR and face match
Insights panel for credit score trends and repayment behavior
SMS/email alerts for transactions and EMI reminders
Fully scalable backend using Firebase + Firestore
Progressive Web App with offline-first support
